results.title: Iceman
results.creator_credit: Fred Schepisi, Norman Jewison, Patrick Palmer and Universal Pictures
results.brief_description: Drama about a team of Arctic researchers who find a 40,000 year old man frozen in ice and bring him back to life. The anthropologist wants to befriend him and learn about man’s past while the medical researchers want to discover the secret that will allow man to live in a frozen state. Stars Timothy Hutton, John Lone and Lindsay Crouse.

results.title: Warm nights on a slow moving train
results.creator_credit: Bob Ellis, Patric Juillet, Ross Dimsey and Western Pacific Films
results.brief_description: Wendy Hughes plays an art teacher employed at a Catholic girls’ convent school from Monday to Friday. At weekends she rides the overnight express train between Sydney and Melbourne as a prostitute in order to keep her addict brother supplied with morphine. Every week she changes her appearance, mannerisms, and personality, luring male clients who always pay and leave by 3 a.m. However, an intelligence agent (Colin Friels) becomes her lover and they team up to murder a politician on the train. Wendy Hughes exudes sensuality, power and passion in the lead role.

results.title: Turkey shoot
results.creator_credit: Brian Trenchard-Smith, William Fayman, Antony Ginnane and Filmco
results.brief_description: Set in 1995 where criminals are hunted in controlled environments. There is no room for individuality and anyone who dares to be different is thrown into a detention camp for brainwashing where they are tortured and become candidates for manhunts. Cast includes Steve Railsback, Olivia Hussey, Michael Craig and Carmen Duncan.

results.title: Next of kin
results.creator_credit: Tony Williams, Robert Le Tet, The Film House and SIS Productions
results.brief_description: A young woman inherits an old people’s home and finds that its inmates are becoming the victims of a mad killer.

results.title: Norman Loves Rose
results.creator_credit: Henri Safran, Basil Appleby, Norman Films and Direct Hit Productions
results.brief_description: Norman is a sensitive, precocious 13 year old preparing for his formal entry into Jewish manhood, the bar mitzvah. He is also passionately in love with his sister-in-law, Rose, who is pregnant. Stars Carol Kane, Tony Owen with Barry Otto, Sandy Gore and Warren Mitchell.

results.title: Crimes of the Heart
results.creator_credit: Ken Adam, Bruce Beresford, Freddie Fields and De Laurentiis Entertainment Group
results.brief_description: Unconventional comedy in which three writers reunite and share their problems, eccentricities and idiosyncrasies during a reunion. The youngest has just been released from prison after shooting her husband because he beat up her black lover. During their time together assorted family secrets are revealed. Based on play of the same name by Beth Henley, which won a Pulitzer Prize. Stars Diane Keaton, Jessica Lange and Sissy Spacek.

results.title: One night stand
results.creator_credit: John Duigan, Simon Wincer, Richard Mason and Astra Film Productions
results.brief_description: On the eve of World war three a group of young people find themselves in the deserted Sydney Opera House. As they hear that war has broken out in Europe and heads for Australia, the four spend what may be their last New Year’s Eve amusing themselves and growing closer in friendship. Cast: Tyler Coppin, Cassandra Delaney, Jay Hackett, Saskia Post, Midnight Oil.

results.title: The Black stallion
results.creator_credit: Carroll Ballard, Francis Ford Coppola, Omni Zoetrope and United Artists Corporation
results.brief_description: A young boy is saved from a devastating shipwreck by a beautiful black stallion. Together they survive on an isolated island, an experience that creates a lasting bond between them. After their rescue, they return to America where they meet Henry Dailey (Mickey Rooney) an irascible ex-jockey and horse trainer. Dailey is quick to realise the racing potential of the stallion and teaches the boy to be a jockey. Based on the novel by Walter Farley the film stars Kelly Reno, Mickey Reno and Teri Garr.

results.title: Lord of the Flies
results.creator_credit: Peter Brook, Lewis M. Allen, Two Arts and Allen-Hogdon Productions
results.brief_description: A group of schoolboys crash on a remote tropical island and revert to the laws of the jungle to survive. However, when savage emotions split them into two warring tribes, hate turns to bloodlust, culminating in a shocking murder. A frightening adaptation of Nobel Prizewinner, William Golding’s novel.

results.title: Ossessione
results.creator_credit: Luchino Visconti, Libero Solaroli and ICI (GB)
results.brief_description: A restless wife, Giovanna, meets Gino, a rough and handsome vagabond. Their passionate affair leads to the murder of Giovanna’s boorish husband. Can a strong and sensual affair survive the guilt? Adapted from James M. Cain’s classic novel “The Postman always rings twice”, Ossessione is a dark and provocative drama of sexual tension. It heralded a new era of Italian cinema, establishing Luchino Visconti as a leading and controversial exponent of Neorealism. In Italian with English subtitles.
